text: The men's 5000 metres event at the 1978 Commonwealth Games was held on 8 and 10 August at the Commonwealth Stadium in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Henry Rono '''' |Michael Musyoki '''' |Brendan Foster '''' |} ==Results== ===Heats=== Held on 8 August Qualification: First 6 in each heat (Q) and the next 3 fastest (q) qualify for the final. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
